name: Copenhagen Infrastructure Partners
description: Copenhagen Infrastructure Partners (CIP) is a pioneering investment management company focused on renewable energy infrastructure. Established in 2012 and headquartered in Copenhagen, Denmark, CIP specializes in developing and managing investments in energy infrastructure projects, with a strong emphasis on wind and solar energy. The firm aims to accelerate the transition to a sustainable energy future by providing capital and expertise to projects that generate clean energy and contribute to reducing greenhouse gas emissions. CIP manages several funds that invest in offshore and onshore wind farms, solar parks, and energy storage solutions across Europe, North America, and Asia. The company is committed to creating long-term value for its investors while promoting sustainable practices and environmental stewardship. By leveraging its extensive network and deep market knowledge, CIP seeks to identify and support innovative energy solutions that align with global climate goals. With a dedicated team of professionals and a robust portfolio of projects, Copenhagen Infrastructure Partners is at the forefront of the drive towards a sustainable and resilient energy landscape.
